meta.title: Ali Nails | Premium Nail and Eyelash Services
meta.description: Premium nail and eyelash extension services tailored to enhance your natural beauty
meta.keywords: nail salon, eyelash extensions, beauty salon, manicure, pedicure, gel nails, acrylic nails

hero.title: Elevate Your Beauty
hero.subtitle: Premium nail and eyelash extension services tailored to enhance your natural beauty

about.title: About Alicia
about.subtitle: Passionate About Beauty
about.paragraph1: With over 10 years of experience in the beauty industry, Alicia has mastered the art of nail design and eyelash extensions. Her passion for beauty and attention to detail ensures that every client leaves feeling confident and beautiful.
about.paragraph2: Alicia continuously updates her skills with the latest techniques and trends, bringing innovative and high-quality services to her clients. She believes that beauty treatments should be a relaxing and enjoyable experience, which is why she has created a serene and welcoming environment for all her clients.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of premium nail and eyelash services to enhance your natural beauty

manicure.title: Manicure
manicure.description: Classic manicure with cuticle care and polish

gelPolish.title: Gel Polish
gelPolish.description: Long-lasting gel polish with a perfect finish

acrylicNails.title: Acrylic Nails
acrylicNails.description: Full set of acrylic nails with design options

eyelashExtensions.title: Eyelash Extensions
eyelashExtensions.description: Classic, hybrid, or volume lash extensions

lashLiftTint.title: Lash Lift & Tint
lashLiftTint.description: Natural lash enhancement with curl and color

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: See what our clients have to say about their experience

sarah.name: Sarah M.
sarah.text: Alicia is amazing! My nails have never looked better. The salon is clean, modern, and so relaxing.

jessica.name: Jessica T.
jessica.text: I've been getting my lashes done here for months. The results are always perfect and last so long!

emma.name: Emma L.
emma.text: Best nail salon in town! The attention to detail is incredible and the staff is so friendly.
